name: Share Capital
description: Share capital account - minimum 500 shares at KES 100 per share

name: Normal Deposit
description: Normal savings deposit with minimum monthly contribution of KES 500

name: Junior Saving
description: Savings account for members below 18 years old

name: Normal Loan
description: Standard loan product with reducing balance interest at 14.4% per month. Maximum 9 years repayment period

name: Emergency Loan
description: Quick emergency loan with 14% monthly interest. Maximum 18 months repayment

name: Development Loan
description: Long-term development loan for business and property development

name: Top Up Loan
description: Top-up facility for existing loan customers with good repayment history

name: Education Loan
description: Education loan for school fees and educational expenses

name: Asset Based Loan
description: Asset-backed loan with flat interest rate. Maximum KES 150000

name: Boresha Maisha Loan
description: Small business loan with flat rate. Maximum KES 100000

name: Salary Advance Loan
description: Short-term salary advance for check-off members. Maximum KES 20000

name: Quickfix Loan
description: Ultra-short term loan for quick cash needs. Maximum KES 5000
